title: If PPC shifting out, LRAS must be shifting right

content.question: If a countryâ€™s production possibilities curve is shifting outward, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: The aggregate demand curve is shifting to the right.

The long-run aggregate supply curve is shifting to the right.

content.answer: The long-run aggregate supply curve is shifting to the right.
